Description: Blue-green glazed composition shabti of Hor with tripartite wig, fillet and a seed-basket on the back, arms crossed in relief to hold two hoes, vertical line of hieroglyphs.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Louis, Duc de Blacas d'Aulps
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Louis, Duc de Blacas d'Aulps
